name: biochemist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a scientist who studies the chemistry of living things: Biochemists have greatly advanced human understanding of how cells copy themselves. Leon trained as a medical doctor and as a biochemist. See
biochemistry
More examplesFewer examplesShe is a biochemist at the University of California.A biochemist discovered a gene that tells plants to die at the end of a season.The age-dating technique was developed by biochemist Jeffrey Bada.
